item.name: Get pre-signed URL for uploading or downloading an asset

query.description: Whether the URL is for downloading (true) or uploading (false)

variable.description: The S3 path of the file (wildcard path allowed)

request.description: Generates a temporary pre-signed URL to upload or download a file from S3.

query.description: Whether the URL is for downloading (true) or uploading (false)

variable.description: The S3 path of the file (wildcard path allowed)

query.description: Whether to force download of the file

variable.description: The S3 path of the file (wildcard path allowed)

request.description: Fetches a file from S3 and streams it directly to the client. Can optionally force download.

query.description: Whether to force download of the file

variable.description: The S3 path of the file (wildcard path allowed)

query.description: Whether to force download of the file

variable.description: The S3 path of the file (wildcard path allowed)
